accesskeys.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique
accesskeys.help: accesskey attribute value should be unique

area-alt.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
area-alt.help: Active <area> elements must have alternate text

aria-allowed-attr.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
aria-allowed-attr.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

aria-allowed-role.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
aria-allowed-role.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

aria-command-name.description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
aria-command-name.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

aria-dialog-name.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
aria-dialog-name.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

aria-hidden-body.description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.
aria-hidden-body.help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body

aria-hidden-focus.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
aria-hidden-focus.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

aria-input-field-name.description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
aria-input-field-name.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

aria-meter-name.description: Ensures every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
aria-meter-name.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

aria-progressbar-name.description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
aria-progressbar-name.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

aria-required-attr.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
aria-required-attr.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

aria-required-children.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
aria-required-children.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

aria-required-parent.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
aria-required-parent.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

aria-roledescription.description: Ensure aria-roledescription is only used on elements with an implicit or explicit role
aria-roledescription.help: aria-roledescription must be on elements with a semantic role

aria-roles.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
aria-roles.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

aria-text.description: Ensures "role=text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants

aria-toggle-field-name.description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
aria-toggle-field-name.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

aria-tooltip-name.description: Ensures every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
aria-tooltip-name.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

aria-treeitem-name.description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
aria-treeitem-name.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

aria-valid-attr-value.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
aria-valid-attr-value.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

aria-valid-attr.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
aria-valid-attr.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

audio-caption.help: <audio> elements must have a captions track

autocomplete-valid.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
autocomplete-valid.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

avoid-inline-spacing.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
avoid-inline-spacing.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

blink.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

bypass.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
bypass.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

color-contrast-enhanced.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AAA contrast ratio thresholds
color-contrast-enhanced.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

color-contrast.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
color-contrast.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

css-orientation-lock.description: Ensures content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations
css-orientation-lock.help: CSS Media queries must not lock display orientation

definition-list.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

dlitem.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
dlitem.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

document-title.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
document-title.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

duplicate-id-active.description: Ensures every id attribute value of active elements is unique
duplicate-id-active.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

duplicate-id-aria.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
duplicate-id-aria.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

duplicate-id.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
duplicate-id.help: id attribute value must be unique

empty-table-header.description: Ensures table headers have discernible text
empty-table-header.help: Table header text should not be empty

focus-order-semantics.description: Ensures elements in the focus order have a role appropriate for interactive content
focus-order-semantics.help: Elements in the focus order should have an appropriate role

form-field-multiple-labels.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
form-field-multiple-labels.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

frame-focusable-content.description: Ensures <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
frame-focusable-content.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

frame-tested.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
frame-tested.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

frame-title-unique.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
frame-title-unique.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

frame-title.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
frame-title.help: Frames must have an accessible name

heading-order.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
heading-order.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

hidden-content.help: Hidden content on the page should be analyzed

html-has-lang.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
html-has-lang.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

html-lang-valid.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
html-lang-valid.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

html-xml-lang-mismatch.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
html-xml-lang-mismatch.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

identical-links-same-purpose.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
identical-links-same-purpose.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

image-alt.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation

image-redundant-alt.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
image-redundant-alt.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

input-button-name.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
input-button-name.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

input-image-alt.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
input-image-alt.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

label-content-name-mismatch.description: Ensures that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
label-content-name-mismatch.help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

label-title-only.description: Ensures that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
label-title-only.help: Form elements should have a visible label

label.description: Ensures every form element has a label

landmark-banner-is-top-level.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
landmark-banner-is-top-level.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-complementary-is-top-level.description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
landmark-complementary-is-top-level.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-main-is-top-level.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
landmark-main-is-top-level.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-banner.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-banner.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-main.description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-main.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

landmark-one-main.description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
landmark-one-main.help: Document should have one main landmark

landmark-unique.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

link-in-text-block.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
link-in-text-block.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

list.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
list.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

listitem.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

marquee.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

meta-refresh-no-exceptions.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
meta-refresh-no-exceptions.help: Delayed refresh must not be used

meta-refresh.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
meta-refresh.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

meta-viewport-large.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
meta-viewport-large.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

meta-viewport.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
meta-viewport.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

nested-interactive.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
nested-interactive.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

no-autoplay-audio.description: Ensures <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
no-autoplay-audio.help: <video> or <audio> elements must not play automatically

p-as-heading.description:
Ensure bold, italic text and font-size is not used to style

elements as a heading
p-as-heading.help:
Styled

elements must not be used as headings

page-has-heading-one.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
page-has-heading-one.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

presentation-role-conflict.description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
presentation-role-conflict.help: Ensure elements marked as presentational are consistently ignored

region.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
region.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

role-img-alt.help: [role='img'] elements must have an alternative text

scope-attr-valid.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
scope-attr-valid.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

scrollable-region-focusable.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
scrollable-region-focusable.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

select-name.description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
select-name.help: Select element must have an accessible name

server-side-image-map.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
server-side-image-map.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

skip-link.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
skip-link.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

svg-img-alt.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
svg-img-alt.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

tabindex.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
tabindex.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

table-duplicate-name.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
table-duplicate-name.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

table-fake-caption.description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.
table-fake-caption.help: Data or header cells must not be used to give caption to a data table.

target-size.description: Ensure touch target have sufficient size and space
target-size.help: All touch targets must be 24px large, or leave sufficient space

td-has-header.description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a <table> larger than 3 by 3  has one or more table headers
td-has-header.help: Non-empty <td> elements in larger <table> must have an associated table header

td-headers-attr.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
td-headers-attr.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

th-has-data-cells.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
th-has-data-cells.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

valid-lang.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
valid-lang.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

fail.singular: 不能直接使用抽象角色：${data.values}
fail.plural: 不能直接使用抽象角色：${data.values}

aria-allowed-attr.pass: 定义的角色正确使用 ARIA 属性

fail.singular: 不允许使用 ARIA 属性：${data.values}
fail.plural: 不允许使用 ARIA 属性：${data.values}

aria-allowed-attr.incomplete: 检查在该元素上忽略 ARIA 属性是否存在问题：${data.values}

aria-allowed-role.pass: 给定元素允许使用 ARIA 角色

fail.singular: 给定元素不允许使用 ARIA 角色 ${data.values}
fail.plural: 给定元素不允许使用 ARIA 角色 ${data.values}

incomplete.singular: 当可见化元素时，必须删除 ARIA 角色 ${data.values}，因为对该元素不允许使用它
incomplete.plural: 当可见化元素时，必须删除 ARIA 角色 ${data.values}，因为对该元素不允许使用它们

aria-busy.pass: 元素具有 aria-busy 属性
aria-busy.fail: 元素没有 aria-busy="true" 属性

aria-errormessage.pass: 存在 aria-errormessage 并引用对屏幕阅读器可见的元素，使用了受支持的 aria-errormessage 技术

fail.singular: aria-errormessage 值 ${data.values} 必须使用技术来宣布消息（例如 aria-live、aria-describedby、role=alert 等）
fail.plural: aria-errormessage 值 ${data.values} 必须使用技术来宣布消息（例如 aria-live、aria-describedby、role=alert 等）
fail.hidden: aria-errormessage 值 ${data.values} 不能引用隐藏元素

incomplete.singular: 确保 aria-errormessage 值 ${data.values} 引用现有元素
incomplete.plural: 确保 aria-errormessage 值${data.values} 引用现有元素
incomplete.idrefs: 无法确定页面上是否存在 aria-errormessage 元素：${data.values}

aria-hidden-body.pass: 文档正文上没有 aria-hidden 属性
aria-hidden-body.fail: 文档正文上不应该存在 aria-hidden=true 属性

aria-level.incomplete: 在所有屏幕阅读器和浏览器组合中，不支持大于 6 的 aria-level 值

aria-prohibited-attr.pass: 允许使用 ARIA 属性

fail.hasRolePlural: 不允许在具有角色 `${data.role}` 的元素中使用${data.prohibited} 属性。
fail.hasRoleSingular: 不允许在具有角色 `${data.role}` 的元素中使用${data.prohibited} 属性。
fail.noRolePlural: 在没有有效角色属性的 ${data.nodeName} 上不能使用 ${data.prohibited} 属性。
fail.noRoleSingular: 在没有有效角色属性的 ${data.nodeName} 上不能使用 ${data.prohibited} 属性。

incomplete.hasRoleSingular: 不建议将 ${data.prohibited} 属性与角色 `${data.role}` 一起使用。
incomplete.hasRolePlural: 不建议将 ${data.prohibited} 属性与角色 `${data.role}` 一起使用。
incomplete.noRoleSingular: 不建议在没有有效角色属性的 ${data.nodeName} 上使用 ${data.prohibited} 属性。
incomplete.noRolePlural: 不建议在没有有效角色属性的 ${data.nodeName} 上使用 ${data.prohibited} 属性。

aria-required-attr.pass: 所有必需的 ARIA 属性都存在

fail.singular: 缺少必需的 ARIA 属性：${data.values}
fail.plural: 缺少必需的 ARIA 属性：${data.values}

aria-required-children.pass: 存在必需的 ARIA 子元素

fail.singular: 缺少必需的 ARIA 子角色：${data.values}
fail.plural: 缺少必需的 ARIA 子角色：${data.values}
fail.unallowed: 元素有不允许的子元素（请参阅相关节点）

incomplete.singular: 期望添加 ARIA 子角色：${data.values}
incomplete.plural: 期望添加 ARIA 子角色：${data.values}

aria-required-parent.pass: 存在必需的 ARIA 父角色

fail.singular: 缺少必需的 ARIA 父角色：${data.values}
fail.plural: 缺少必需的 ARIA 父角色：${data.values}

aria-roledescription.pass: 在支持的语义化角色上使用了 aria-roledescription
aria-roledescription.incomplete: 检查 aria-roledescription 是否被受支持的屏幕阅读器宣读
aria-roledescription.fail: 为元素设置支持 aria-roledescription 的角色

aria-unsupported-attr.pass: 支持使用 ARIA 属性
aria-unsupported-attr.fail: ARIA 属性在屏幕阅读器和辅助技术中得到的广泛支持：${data.values}

incomplete.noId: 页面上不存在 ARIA 属性元素 ID：${data.needsReview}
incomplete.noIdShadow: 页面上不存在 ARIA 属性元素 ID，或者该元素是另一个 Shadow DOM 树的后代：${data.needsReview}
incomplete.ariaCurrent: ARIA 属性值无效，将作为“aria-current=true”处理：${data.needsReview}
incomplete.idrefs: 无法确定 ARIA 属性元素 ID 在页面上是否存在：${data.needsReview}
incomplete.empty: ARIA 属性值为空时将被忽略：${data.needsReview}

fallbackrole.fail: 只使用一个角色值，因为在旧版浏览器中不支持回退角色
fallbackrole.incomplete: 只使用 'presentation' 或 'none' 角色，因为它们是同义词。

pass.singular: 元素具有全局 ARIA 属性：${data.values}
pass.plural: 元素具有全局 ARIA 属性：${data.values}

has-global-aria-attribute.fail: 元素没有全局 ARIA 属性

fail.singular: Role must be one of the valid ARIA roles: ${data.values}
fail.plural: Roles must be one of the valid ARIA roles: ${data.values}

no-implicit-explicit-label.pass: There is no mismatch between a <label> and accessible name
no-implicit-explicit-label.incomplete: Check that the <label> does not need be part of the ARIA ${data} field's name

unsupportedrole.fail: The role used is not widely supported in screen readers and assistive technologies: ${data}

valid-scrollable-semantics.pass: Element has valid semantics for an element in the focus order.
valid-scrollable-semantics.fail: Element has invalid semantics for an element in the focus order.

color-contrast-enhanced.pass: Element has sufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio}

fail.default: Element has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio} (foreground color: ${data.fgColor}, background color: ${data.bgColor}, font size: ${data.fontSize}, font weight: ${data.fontWeight}). Expected contrast ratio of ${data.expectedContrastRatio}
fail.fgOnShadowColor: Element has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio} between the foreground and shadow color (foreground color: ${data.fgColor}, text-shadow color: ${data.shadowColor}, font size: ${data.fontSize}, font weight: ${data.fontWeight}). Expected contrast ratio of ${data.expectedContrastRatio}
fail.shadowOnBgColor: Element has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio} between the shadow color and background color (text-shadow color: ${data.shadowColor}, background color: ${data.bgColor}, font size: ${data.fontSize}, font weight: ${data.fontWeight}). Expected contrast ratio of ${data.expectedContrastRatio}

incomplete.bgImage: Element's background color could not be determined due to a background image
incomplete.bgGradient: Element's background color could not be determined due to a background gradient
incomplete.imgNode: Element's background color could not be determined because element contains an image node
incomplete.bgOverlap: Element's background color could not be determined because it is overlapped by another element
incomplete.fgAlpha: Element's foreground color could not be determined because of alpha transparency
incomplete.elmPartiallyObscured: Element's background color could not be determined because it's partially obscured by another element
incomplete.elmPartiallyObscuring: Element's background color could not be determined because it partially overlaps other elements
incomplete.outsideViewport: Element's background color could not be determined because it's outside the viewport
incomplete.equalRatio: Element has a 1:1 contrast ratio with the background
incomplete.shortTextContent: Element content is too short to determine if it is actual text content
incomplete.nonBmp: Element content contains only non-text characters
incomplete.pseudoContent: Element's background color could not be determined due to a pseudo element

pass.default: Element has sufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio}

fail.default: Element has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio} (foreground color: ${data.fgColor}, background color: ${data.bgColor}, font size: ${data.fontSize}, font weight: ${data.fontWeight}). Expected contrast ratio of ${data.expectedContrastRatio}
fail.fgOnShadowColor: Element has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio} between the foreground and shadow color (foreground color: ${data.fgColor}, text-shadow color: ${data.shadowColor}, font size: ${data.fontSize}, font weight: ${data.fontWeight}). Expected contrast ratio of ${data.expectedContrastRatio}
fail.shadowOnBgColor: Element has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio} between the shadow color and background color (text-shadow color: ${data.shadowColor}, background color: ${data.bgColor}, font size: ${data.fontSize}, font weight: ${data.fontWeight}). Expected contrast ratio of ${data.expectedContrastRatio}

incomplete.bgImage: Element's background color could not be determined due to a background image
incomplete.bgGradient: Element's background color could not be determined due to a background gradient
incomplete.imgNode: Element's background color could not be determined because element contains an image node
incomplete.bgOverlap: Element's background color could not be determined because it is overlapped by another element
incomplete.fgAlpha: Element's foreground color could not be determined because of alpha transparency
incomplete.elmPartiallyObscured: Element's background color could not be determined because it's partially obscured by another element
incomplete.elmPartiallyObscuring: Element's background color could not be determined because it partially overlaps other elements
incomplete.outsideViewport: Element's background color could not be determined because it's outside the viewport
incomplete.equalRatio: Element has a 1:1 contrast ratio with the background
incomplete.shortTextContent: Element content is too short to determine if it is actual text content
incomplete.nonBmp: Element content contains only non-text characters
incomplete.pseudoContent: Element's background color could not be determined due to a pseudo element

link-in-text-block-style.pass: Links can be distinguished from surrounding text by visual styling
link-in-text-block-style.fail: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

link-in-text-block.pass: Links can be distinguished from surrounding text in some way other than by color

fail.fgContrast: The link has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio}:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is ${data.requiredContrastRatio}:1, link text: ${data.nodeColor}, surrounding text: ${data.parentColor})
fail.bgContrast: The link background has insufficient color contrast of ${data.contrastRatio} (Minimum contrast is ${data.requiredContrastRatio}:1, link background color: ${data.nodeBackgroundColor}, surrounding background color: ${data.parentBackgroundColor})

incomplete.default: Element's foreground contrast ratio could not be determined
incomplete.bgContrast: Element's background contrast ratio could not be determined
incomplete.bgImage: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined due to a background image
incomplete.bgGradient: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined due to a background gradient
incomplete.imgNode: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined because element contains an image node
incomplete.bgOverlap: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined because of element overlap

autocomplete-appropriate.pass: the autocomplete value is on an appropriate element
autocomplete-appropriate.fail: the autocomplete value is inappropriate for this type of input

autocomplete-valid.pass: the autocomplete attribute is correctly formatted
autocomplete-valid.fail: the autocomplete attribute is incorrectly formatted

accesskeys.fail: Document has multiple elements with the same accesskey

focusable-disabled.pass: No focusable elements contained within element
focusable-disabled.incomplete: Check if the focusable elements immediately move the focus indicator
focusable-disabled.fail: Focusable content should be disabled or be removed from the DOM

focusable-modal-open.pass: No focusable elements while a modal is open
focusable-modal-open.incomplete: Check that focusable elements are not tabbable in the current state

focusable-no-name.pass: Element is not in tab order or has accessible text
focusable-no-name.fail: Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
focusable-no-name.incomplete: Unable to determine if element has an accessible name

focusable-not-tabbable.pass: No focusable elements contained within element
focusable-not-tabbable.incomplete: Check if the focusable elements immediately move the focus indicator
focusable-not-tabbable.fail: Focusable content should have tabindex='-1' or be removed from the DOM

frame-focusable-content.pass: Element does not have focusable descendants
frame-focusable-content.incomplete: Could not determine if element has descendants

landmark-is-top-level.pass: The ${data.role} landmark is at the top level.
landmark-is-top-level.fail: The ${data.role} landmark is contained in another landmark.

no-focusable-content.pass: Element does not have focusable descendants

fail.notHidden: Using a negative tabindex on an element inside an interactive control does not prevent assistive technologies from focusing the element (even with 'aria-hidden=true')

no-focusable-content.incomplete: Could not determine if element has descendants

page-has-heading-one.pass: Page has at least one level-one heading
page-has-heading-one.fail: Page must have a level-one heading

page-has-main.pass: Document has at least one main landmark
page-has-main.fail: Document does not have a main landmark

page-no-duplicate-banner.pass: Document does not have more than one banner landmark
page-no-duplicate-banner.fail: Document has more than one banner landmark

page-no-duplicate-contentinfo.pass: Document does not have more than one contentinfo landmark
